body:
The rings are ambiguous. They use those ring as activation key for their weapons, so it doesn't necessarily means commitment. 

Ah, somehow I like Kazuha x Kanaho more than the more popular Takane x Kanaho. Both are nice though.

Art and story is good just kinda sad.
Cheating tag might be missing, there are rings and mention that they have to go back to their partner.
I may not understand but this is nice.
